description.value:
Trigger Two or more characters enter area E3 and make any sound at all

Effect Sounds or speech are amplified and garbled into a terrible, shrieking cry. All creatures in the area take [[/r (2d10+11)[mental]]] damage (@Check[type:will|dc:28|basic:true] save). The trap then rolls initiative.

details.description: Discordant music, dance, and poetry combine to build a deep suspicion and distrust of strangers.
details.disable: @Check[type:performance|dc:28] to counteract the performance or @Check[type:religion|dc:28] or @Check[type:occult|dc:28] to disrupt the spiritual energy. Two total successes are needed to disable the trap. The mechanical head can automatically disable the trap with two uses of Inspired Recitation.
details.reset: The hazard stops when there are no conscious creatures in area E3 and resets after 1 minute.
details.routine:
(1 action; emotion, fear, mental, occult) The echoes continue to reverberate, tearing at those in the area and filling them with distrust of others. All creatures in the area take [[/r (2d10+11)[mental]]] damage and must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:28|traits:emotion,fear,mental,occult,damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and is immune to the effects for 1 minute.

Success The target takes half damage.

Failure The target takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} by feelings of distrust and anxiety.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2}.
